data.title: Robogeisha
data.meta_description: Robogeisha is a low budget movie with high levels of surrealism and absurd freakism. The main character is a geisha with innate powers that is recruited by a group of assassing geishas. Step by ste…
data.text:
Robogeisha is a low budget movie with high levels of surrealism and absurd freakism. The main character is a geisha with innate powers that is recruited by a group of assassing geishas. Step by step, parts of her body are replaced by lethal weapons:

This is the trailer. You can watch the full movie here

Walking on a road and… she suddenly turns into a tank!

It is BAD movie but it has some good WTF moments guaranteed and it will surely bring a few laughs. If you liked Robegeisha, The Machine Girl is another movie made with the same style by the same director.
